title: Second Derivative and Concavity
text: If $$\operatorname{f''}\left(x\right)>0$$ over interval I, then f is concave up over I.\nIf $$\operatorname{f''}\left(x\right)<0$$ over interval I, then f is concave down over I.

title: Finding f''(x)
text: Find the second derivative of f(x), and then solve to find when f''(x) is greater than $$0$$. What is the second derivative of $$x^2+x+1$$?
